text: The List of Omiya Ardija players is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Omiya Ardija is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in the Ōmiya wardThe team's hometown is the city of Saitama in Saitama Prefecture, but its name comes from the former city of Ōmiya, which is now a ward of the prefectural capital city. of Saitama.Soccerway.com, "Ōmiya Ardija"; retrieved 2012-3-15. ==List== :This list is not finished; you can help Wikipedia by adding to it. * An Yong-Hak * Koji Ezumi * Chikara Fujimoto * Yoshihito Fujita * Yuki Fukaya * Hayato Hashimoto * Naoki Ishihara * Shin Kanazawa * Takashi Kitano * Kazuhiro Murakami * Arata Sugiyama * Daisuke Tada * Shusuke Tsubouchi * Tomoya Uchida ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams == References == ==Other websites== * Omiya Ardija website * J.League Club Guide Omiya Ardija
title: List of Omiya Ardija players
